numerical_values.context: Height from grade for roofed entry features

mandatory: Roofed entry features on the 1st floor that are less than 12' high count once
Roofed entry features on the 1st floor that are more than 12' high count twice
conditional_logic: Openness of the sides determines whether roofed porches on the 1st floor count
Height, depth, & openness determine whether recessed porches count

explicit_deviations: Non-roofed features generally do not count

hierarchical: Porches and entry features are part of gross floor area assessment
